name: 10mg: SLASHER, Interrupted (itch)
description:
10mg is a collection of 10 minute long games.

SLASHER, Interrupted is a visual novel, in which you attempt to tell a horror story whilst your girlfriends interrupt with their own ideas. Will you stick to a cohesive plot, or try and please everyone's ideas at once?

Featuring:
  • 7,000 words of lighthearted campfire banter
  • A branching story with 27 ending combinations
  • Pet a cat!
  • Kill multiple characters!
  • Get roasted for your messy plot choices!

A game by SOFTERROR INTERACTIVE:

Freya Campbell (Writing & Music)
Dana Holdampf (Art & UI Design)

This game is a sequel to the twine game Perseids, available on itchio here - although it is not necessary to have played this first.
